problem.markdown:
1. In Charpy impact test, the specimen is kept as
() Cantilever beam () Fixed ended beam (x) Simply supported beam () Overhanging beam
2. Tensile and bending stress also gives impact resisting qualities of material.(Say true or false)
(x) False () True
3. Match the following for charpy test
(x) 1-d; 2-e; 3-b; 4-a; 5-c () 1-c; 2-d; 3-a; 4-e; 5-b () 1-a; 2-b; 3-c; 4-d; 5-e () 1-d; 2-e; 3-a; 4-b; 5-c
4. Stress induced in a body due to suddenly applied load compared to when it is applied gradually is
() Half () Same (x) 2 times () 4 times
5. The quantitative result of the impact test - the energy needed to fracture a material can be used to measure the toughness of the material and the ________.
() Hardness () Corrosion (x) Yield strength () Creep deformation
